title: The area of the open able external windows on a floor shall be not less than 2 1/2 per cent of the floor area
clause_text: The area of the open able external windows on a floor shall be not less than 2 1/2 per cent of the floor area. The locks for these windows shall be fitted with budget lock of the carriage key type (which can be opened with the point of a fireman's' axe). The following provisions shall be made for a fire lift. -
